title: Cray shasta systems: Spack cannot detect architecture
body:
My team is enthusiastic to give Spack a chance to build packages for a pair of large Cray Shasta systems coming later this year.  On our test system, I am experiencing issues with what I think are the Spack initialization and craype recognition routines (possibly the cle-release file .... I was looking at issue [12178](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/12187)) to come to this conclusion.

Spack fails to start normally if the module for craype is loaded.  The cle-release file on Shasta in UAN (front-end node), UAI (login container, and CLE (Compute node) are all identical:
```
cat /etc/opt/cray/release/cle-release
PRODUCT="Cray's Linux Environment"
OS=SLES15SP1
ARCH=x86_64
VERSION=1.2.0
DATE=20200421195827
```
spack debug fails or I'd provide it.

### Error Message

```console
# . $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.sh
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/apps/dev/spack/current/bin/spack", line 64, in <module>

  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 628, in print_setup_info

  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/llnl/util/lang.py", line 178, in _memoized_function

  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/architecture.py", line 532, in sys_type
    arch = Arch(platform(), 'default_os', 'default_target')
  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/llnl/util/lang.py", line 178, in _memoized_function
    func.cache[args] = func(*args)
  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/architecture.py", line 516, in platform

  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/platforms/cray.py", line 76, in __init__
    back_distro = Cnl()
  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/operating_systems/cnl.py", line 81, in __init__

  File "/apps/dev/spack/spack-0.14.2/lib/spack/spack/operating_systems/cnl.py", line 92, in _detect_crayos_version
```
